name: Depth (itch) (clepirelli)
description:
Made as part of the Game Design education at Uppsala University : Campus Gotland by  Carl Hvarfvenius Blomgren, Clara Cox, Clément Pirelli, Hanna Aho Lind and Nicklas Rosén.

The player controls a rookie submarine officer gone on a mission in the depths. Turns out, you're not the only one there...
